title: Ashanti and Keyshia Cole go head-to-head on Verzuz
author: REVOLT TV
description:
After being postponed twice before -- and not to mention after months of anticipation -- Keyshia Cole and Ashanti’s highly anticipated Verzuz finally went down on Thursday, Jan. 21 at 8 p.m. ET/ 5 p.m. PT. Even though it started late, the wait was much worth it and viral fans who tuned in on social media loved every minute of it.

From the great stories both Cole and Ashanti told about Diddy and Tupac in between songs to even O.T. Genasis' surprise "Love" performance, this Verzuz was one to remember. Special viral audience members included Verzuz's own Swizz Beatz and Timbaland, as well as Cardi B, Keith Powers, Queen Naija and more. 

The music platform revealed news of this final and official Verzuz date a couple weeks ago in a post that showed a flyer for the event, which read: “RAIN, SLEET, HAIL, SNOW LET’S GO. Join us Thursday, January 21st as we kick off the first #VERZUZ of 2021 with @Ashanti and @KeyshiaCole. Thank you everyone for being patient with us. We can’t wait for this magical night with Keyshia and Ashanti!”

Watch Keyshia Cole and Ashanti's Verzuz above!

#keyshiacole #ashanti #verzuz

Artists REVOLT.TV covers include: Joe Budden, Drake, Chance the Rapper, Jay-Z, French Montana, Lil Wayne, Puff Daddy, Diddy, Future, Rick Ross, Remy Ma, Nicki Minaj, Beyonce, Rihanna, Lil Yachty, Kendrick Lamar, Kanye West, Solange, and many more.

localize.description:
在之前被推迟了两次--更不用说经过几个月的期待之后--Keyshia Cole和Ashanti备受期待的Verzuz终于在美国东部时间1月21日星期四晚上8点/太平洋时间下午5点落幕。尽管开始的时间很晚，但等待是非常值得的，在社交媒体上收看的病毒粉丝们喜欢每一分钟。

从Cole和Ashanti在歌曲之间讲述的关于Diddy和Tupac的精彩故事，甚至是O.T. Genasis惊喜的 "Love "表演，这次的Verzuz是一个值得纪念的节目。特别的病毒观众包括Verzuz自己的Swizz Beatz和Timbaland，以及Cardi B、Keith Powers、Queen Naija等。

几周前，音乐平台在一篇帖子中透露了这次Verzuz最后也是正式的约会的消息，帖子中展示了活动的传单，传单上写着。"雨，雪，雹，雪，让我们去。1月21日星期四加入我们，我们将与@Ashanti和@KeyshiaCole一起开启2021年的第一个#VERZUZ%%。感谢大家对我们的耐心等待。我们已经迫不及待地想和Keyshia和Ashanti一起度过这个神奇的夜晚了！"

以上请看Keyshia Cole和Ashanti的Verzuz!

localize.title: Ashanti和Keyshia Cole在Verzuz上一决高下。

localize.description:
在之前被推遲了兩次--更不用說經過幾個月的期待之後--Keyshia Cole和Ashanti備受期待的Verzuz終於在美國東部時間1月21日星期四晚上8點/太平洋時間下午5點落幕。儘管開始的時間很晚，但等待是非常值得的，在社交媒體上收看的病毒粉絲們喜歡每一分鐘。

從Cole和Ashanti在歌曲之間講述的關於Diddy和Tupac的精彩故事，甚至是O.T. Genasis驚喜的 "Love "表演，這次的Verzuz是一個值得紀念的節目。特別的病毒觀衆包括Verzuz自己的Swizz Beatz和Timbaland，以及Cardi B、Keith Powers、Queen Naija等。

幾周前，音樂平臺在一篇帖子中透露了這次Verzuz最後也是正式的約會的消息，帖子中展示了活動的傳單，傳單上寫着。"雨，雪，雹，雪，讓我們去。1月21日星期四加入我們，我們將與@Ashanti和@KeyshiaCole一起開啓2021年的第一個#VERZUZ%%。感謝大家對我們的耐心等待。我們已經迫不及待地想和Keyshia和Ashanti一起度過這個神奇的夜晚了！"
